familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former member of Trump Plaza LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest.

Former president/director/treasurer of Trump Plaza Member Inc. (F/K/A Trump Plaza Corp.), in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.business: Trump Plaza Member Inc. (F/K/A Trump Plaza Corp.)
